nodes.text: The Tortali Platform was an Imperial XQ3 Platform used presumably as a customs checkpoint located at the Tortali IV system of the Outer Rim Territories. It was heavily armed and had a squadron of TIE/IN interceptors and TIE/sa bombers.
The Rebel Alliance sent a strike force consisting of T-65 X-wing starfighters and BTL Y-wing starfighters, with RZ-1 A-wing interceptors as backup, intending to destroy it.
The outcome of the resulting battle depends on which side the player takes.
